channel.title: Anyone want to create a server with me?
channel.description:
Hi my name is Josh, I want to make THE best runescape private server, and I will not settle for 2Nd best.
PROS for ME: :D
-I know basic coding! -I'm awesome at making websites ect. -I'm a good listener and i learn fast. -I have Skype and teamveiwer with a mic. -I don't give up easily. -I am compotent and clever, Meaning i will not just give out staff to anyone. :eek:[/font]
The kind of person i am looking for: :) -You [u][b]Must[/b][/u] be committed and doesn't give up if there is a hard problem to solve. -You [u][b]Should[/b][/u] have Skype and or Teamveiwer. ( Preferbaly with a mic so i can speak to you.) -You [u][b]Should[/b][/u] me compotent and good at coding as I only know basic stuff! -You [u][b]Must[/b][/u] be easy to get along with. -You [u][b]Must[/b][/u] have good communication skills. -You [u][b]Should[/b][/u] have cool ideas that people have not implemented into a RSPS yet!
The requirements ascend from the MOST important to the LEAST important. My contact details are as follows, "Joshukm@hotmail.co.uk" OR "Joshukcjjc@hotmail.co.uk" OR "Josh.catchpole101"<<on Skype (Copy and paste the info INSIDE the Commas.) Thanks for reading this far i hope to speak to you soon.

item.title: Anyone want to create a server with me?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

ox random xi:

What revision do you want to use?

Lol, here we go again.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone want to create a server with me?
item.dc:creator: @briskycat briskycat
item.description:
@briskycat wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:5, topic:424108”]So with other words, u want other people to have ideas for you and code it for you
At least do something yourself, and show it off and then ask if some one wants to join u[/quote]

Why is everyone trolling on me? i said i would pick it up. you’ve go to start somewhere. and it least i’m not wasting your time as i am being honest. geeze. websites are harder to make than you think for a start. and i can do BASIC coding so if i’m honest he/She wouldn’t have to do everything. But yes i do agree coding is hard.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone want to create a server with me?

Hi my name is Josh, I want to make THE best runescape private server, and I will not settle for 2Nd best.

PROS for ME:

-I’m awesome at making websites ect.
